Package enjug.erijan.games.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DiceHandler
    This interface handle a collection of GameDice, this is both a controller and a model.
    DieFactory
    Factory interface for the creation of GameDie objects.
    GenericObserver<T>
    This is a generic observer pattern interface.
    GenericSubject
    GenericSubject to be paired with the generic GenericObserver interface in this package.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameDie
    Abstract class describing a general N sided die.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DieTypes
    This is a enum factory to create different kinds of dice.
